dcterms:description: The Cora dataset is a collection of scientific publications classified into different categories. It is commonly used for evaluating machine learning algorithms in the context of citation networks.
dcterms:title: Cora Dataset

dcterms:creator: William L. Hamilton
Zhitao Ying
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Citeseer dataset consists of scientific papers and their citation relationships, used for evaluating algorithms in the context of graph-based learning.
dcterms:title: Citeseer Dataset

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The Pubmed dataset contains scientific publications from the PubMed database, classified into different categories, and is used for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Pubmed Dataset

dcterms:creator: William L. Hamilton
Zhitao Ying
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Reddit dataset consists of posts and comments from the Reddit platform, used for evaluating algorithms in the context of social networks.
dcterms:title: Reddit Dataset
